statements: SELECT * FROM ServerConfiguration;
SELECT server_name, server_os, server_memory_gb FROM ServerConfiguration;
SELECT server_name, server_ip_address FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_os = 'Linux';
SELECT * FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_name, server_storage_gb FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_memory_gb >= 16;
SELECT server_id, server_name, server_os FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_memory_gb > 16 ORDER BY server_id DESC;
SELECT server_name, server_ip_address, server_memory_gb, server_storage_gb FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_os = 'Linux' ORDER BY server_name;
SELECT * FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_storage_gb < 500 AND server_os = 'Windows' ORDER BY server_memory_gb DESC, server_name;
SELECT server_id, server_name FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_storage_gb > 1000 AND server_os = 'Ubuntu' ORDER BY server_name ASC, server_id DESC;
SELECT server_id, server_ip_address, server_os FROM ServerConfiguration WHERE server_memory_gb < 8 ORDER BY server_ip_address;
SELECT id, server_name, ip_address FROM servers;
SELECT * FROM networking_devices;
SELECT server_name, os_type, location FROM servers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, model FROM networking_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT id, server_name, location FROM servers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM servers WHERE os_type = 'Linux' ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT server_name, location FROM servers WHERE location = 'US' ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM servers WHERE location IN ('US', 'UK') AND os_type = 'Windows';
SELECT server_name, ip_address, os_type FROM servers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT server_name, ip_address FROM servers WHERE location != 'Canada' ORDER BY location, server_name;
SELECT * FROM server_config WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_name, server_ip FROM server_config WHERE server_location = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_device;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_device WHERE device_location = 'London';
SELECT history_id, timestamp, action FROM config_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_name, server_ip FROM server_config WHERE server_location = 'USA' ORDER BY server_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM network_device WHERE device_type = 'router' ORDER BY device_location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT server_name, server_ip, server_location FROM server_config WHERE server_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY server_location DESC
SELECT device_name, device_ip, device_location FROM network_device WHERE device_location = 'Data Center'
SELECT server_name, server_ip, server_location FROM server_config WHERE server_location = 'USA' AND server_ip LIKE '192.%'
SELECT * FROM Servers WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_name, location FROM Servers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkingDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT server_id, server_name, location FROM Servers WHERE location != 'California' ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM ServerConfigurations WHERE server_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Servers WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_name, location FROM Servers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT s.server_name, d.device_name FROM Servers s INNER JOIN NetworkingDevices d ON s.ip_address = d.ip_address;
SELECT s.server_name, c.config_name, c.config_value FROM Servers s JOIN ServerConfigurations c ON s.server_id = c.server_id;
SELECT d.device_name, dc.config_name FROM NetworkingDevices d LEFT JOIN DeviceConfigurations dc ON d.device_id = dc.device_id;
SELECT * FROM server_config ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT server_name, os_version FROM server_config WHERE server_id = 3;
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_ip FROM firewall_config WHERE firewall_status = TRUE;
SELECT router_model, router_ip FROM router_config WHERE throughput_mbps > 1000;
SELECT switch_name, ports_count FROM switch_config ORDER BY ports_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM server_config WHERE memory_gb > 16 ORDER BY server_name ASC
SELECT server_name, server_ip FROM server_config WHERE server_ip LIKE '192.168.%'
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_ip, priority_level FROM firewall_config WHERE priority_level > 5 ORDER BY priority_level DESC
SELECT * FROM switch_config WHERE ports_count > 24 ORDER BY switch_name ASC
SELECT router_name, router_model FROM router_config WHERE throughput_mbps < 1000
